vote.title: Authorize Supplemental Agreement No. 10 to the engineering contract with Wiss, Janney, Elstner Associates, Inc. to continue with the development of the Bridge Management Program in support of the Infrastructure Management Plan, to provide engineering and construction inspection services on minor bridge repair projects; and provide inspection and monitoring on multiple bridges - Not to exceed $351,000.00, from $2,033,921.00 to $2,384,921.00 - Financing: General Fund
vote.description: Authorize Supplemental Agreement No. 10 to the engineering contract with Wiss, Janney, Elstner Associates, Inc. to continue with the development of the Bridge Management Program in support of the Infrastructure Management Plan, to provide engineering and construction inspection services on minor bridge repair projects; and provide inspection and monitoring on multiple bridges - Not to exceed $351,000.00, from $2,033,921.00 to $2,384,921.00 - Financing: General Fund
